Dead by Daylight is an exciting, thrilling, and fun horror game experience to play with friends. I have played since the early access and have been playing since. I have purchased and tried every DLC up to date and have enjoyed them all. Each DLC adds new and unique perks for survivors and a new way of playing for Killers. Perks are able to be customized in a way that allows you to have many different builds and loadouts for survivors. This game is a solid 10/10 for me. It is very replayable, very exciting and fun, and never fails to get boring because if you are bored playing Survivor, then play Killer, and vise versa.

By far one of the worst ranking systems I have ever experienced and does not reward you for being able to be efficient as killer and sometimes even lowers your ranks. You can be brain dead and still be promoted as survivor and I know because I am brain dead. Extreme hit box issues and latency problems to the point where I can't even attack as the killer with a whopping 50 ms give or take. ( press M1 5 times in a row in a chase and watch the survivor wonder why I have not swung yet.) Feels cluncky at times as survivor. There are actually a lot more issues with this game but these are the ones that have finally made me decide to review this game, because it destroys all my enjoyment (Also this is a quick review). This game has a great and fun concept but until I see these game breaking issues/ enjoyment breaking issues fixed I cannot recommend this game and tell you that I wish I had all my money back. Worth the money if you play custom with friends or don't mind losing because of game and server issues, and don't spend any more then 10 bucks on the base game.

I have spent way too many hours on this game thinking that it had potential and the devs would fix the small stuff that ruin it. But I was wrong. Keys ruin the experience for killers being able to end a game instantly. Moris and op add ons ruin the game for survivors. Noed, undying, and so on just ruin the fun when you are playing with your friends. The only good thing the devs have done in a long time is nerf spirit. Dont focus on adding stuff to the game focus on removing and reworking them.

MUY BUEN JUEGO!!! buenas mecanicas, buenos asesinos, buenos dlc y sobre todo mapas escalofriantes. solo hay 2 cosas que dejan un mal sabor de boca y son, los campers (problema de la comunidad obviamente) y que el juego necesita una muy buena pc para correr como corresponde aunque en mi caso con 8gb de ram y un procesador i7 sin grafica me lo tira medianamente bien si lo queres disfrutar como se debe asegurate de tener una buena pc.

pay to win bullshit. Kills like cannibile are locked behind a paywall. Also the best perks are either locked behind a paywall or on a rotating randomised store page. 
On top of this, the game is full of bugs, regularly (less than every 15 games) booting a player to lobby AND STILL taking items and reputation points off of players
